text: Very unreliable company. Assigned driver, Ateng charged more than the agreed amount. Had booked the ride on behalf of important overseas guests and he decided to upcharge them on the day of pickup. Furthermore, Fadly, the person-in-charge, was unresponsive when questioned. Will not use them ever again with this level of unprofessionalism.

On time, spacious, air conditioned working well. Awesome service. We hired maxi cab from them in order to pick us a the airport, as we had bicycles transport and several bicycle bags. The driver was on time, and was at the same time extremely professional and very nice. Also, the price was much lower than their competitors I contacted. I highly recommend this service!

Many better service providers in the country who actually care forthier customers. Sent a cab on time but maxicab could not deliver to basement of condo as height of maxi cab more than 2.4m. Had to walk 10 mins in rain with many bags . When asked what we should do and why didnâ€™t he ask upfront on this, talked back saying he is not supposed to know about basement heights. Clearly not one who cares about his Clients. Best avoided
Great travels, well organized, and follow-up. Affordable cost and well taken care of passengers. Strongly recommend Alphard service, and we will use the service again in the future.

There vehicle was clean, quiet and smell new car even smoke free and most importantly the friendly driver put on some kids stuff that made then sit quite and didn't get bored. Driver was also very accommodating as requested. Thank you and will surely use the service again. The response in booking is fast and around the clock.
